function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Insufficient visual comfort leading to eye strain, fatigue, and reduced cognitive performance for occupants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent findings in the impact of green buildings on occupants’ health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to toxic heavy metals in green buildings due to the use of fly ash in construction materials","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contradictory findings in the impact of green buildings on mental and physical well-being of occupants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emission of vocs from common products into the indoor environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sub-standard building conditions in low-income and minority households","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate housing conditions leading to poor indoor air quality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residential segregation based on race and ethnicity","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher level of indoor air pollutants in african american and hispanic houses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Racial segregation and lower housing standards leading to health burden on children","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Children studying in schools near highways exposed to hazardous pollutants","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate working conditions for laborers and employees in blue collar jobs","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration between social, environmental scientists and engineers in developing a framework of health in the built environment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gap in translating science-based evidence and solutions to reduce health risks in the built environment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of conceptualization of built environmental justice and health inequalities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Degradation of indoor conditions leading to decreased productivity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased sick leaves and presenteeism due to unhealthy buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in indoor office environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of musculoskeletal disorders on economic burden","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health-related costs due to poor indoor environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient building design leading to airborne transmission of infectious diseases","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and cooling capacity during extreme events leading to body heat overload and heat-related illnesses.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Over-reliance on indoor cooling systems leading to increased electricity consumption, energy demand, and greenhouse gas emissions during heat waves.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sandstorms leading to degraded air quality, respiratory problems, heart stress, and eye infections.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift from natural ventilation to active cooling strategies like evaporative cooling","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hurricanes, tornados, and floods leading to mold growth in buildings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic highlighting the importance of hvac design and operations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standard-62.1 and standard-90.1 focus on thermal comfort, ventilation, and energy efficiency without considering pandemics, potentially leading to inadequate measures for controlling contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper hvac operation during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clear ventilation rate guidelines for minimizing airborne virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Debate on the applicability and use of the wells-riley model for estimating infection risk during covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of quanta correlation for sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation leading to increased infection risk","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hvac system aiding the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low humidity levels allow droplets to become droplet nuclei, remain in the air for prolonged periods of time, and travel for long distances.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viruses and bacteria thrive on dry conditions.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Human mucus barrier weakens with low humidity levels.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased probability of virus transmission due to high occupant density","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus transmission through surfaces and human-building interactions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about virus transmission via surfaces and the effectiveness of prevention measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to non-wearable sensor systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intrusiveness and effectiveness of wearable sensor systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective use of wearable sensors ws leading to limited disease monitoring and control.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on large-scale datasets for ai models, which may not always be available or reliable.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of incorporation of domain knowledge in data-driven ai models leading to suboptimal performance in disease monitoring and control.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of common standards and guidelines for evaluating healthy building design, construction, and operation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of the strengths and weaknesses of new standards and
